title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]OLYMPICS LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (SRS)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control,cfscrape import re scraper = cfscrape.create_scraper() page_data = scraper.get('https://api.sportsurge.net/events/list?group=81').text r = re.findall('(?s)id":([^,]*).*?:"([^"]*).*?:.*?:.*?:"([^"]*).*?:"([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [('https://api.sportsurge.net/streams/list?event='+i[0],i[1],'https://sportsurge.net'+i[2],i[3]) for i in r] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client,cfscrape import re scraper = cfscrape.create_scraper() page_data = scraper.get('[makelist.param1]').text r = re.findall('(?s)name":"([^,]*)".*?:".*?:"([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in r if 'Stream East' not in i[0] if 'dudestream' not in i[0] if 'chenstream' not in i[0] if 'NbaStreams' not in i[0] if 'Livefreegame' not in i[0] if 'tvsportslive' not in i[0] if 'bilasport' not in i[0] if 'Dubz Streams' not in i[0] if 'Freetvlive1' not in i[0] if 'NoDelayStream' not in i[0] if 'Sportinglivestreamz' not in i[0] if 'Icelz ' not in i[0] if 'bestnhl.com' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'Sports News' not in i[0] if 'sportsio' not in i[0] if 'Streamos' not in i[0] if 'SoccerJumboTV' not in i[0] if 'streamhd247' not in i[0] if 'babysharkstream' not in i[0] if 'Icelz' not in i[0] if 'MyGoodStream' not in i[0] if 'Semensport' not in i[0] if 'Bilasport' not in i[0] if 'Sports24' not in i[0] if 'Yoursports Stream' not in i[0] if 'KobeStreams' not in i[0] if 'sportsway' not in i[0] if 'summerstream' not in i[0] if 'RoyStream' not in i[0] if 'BuffStreams' not in i[0] if 'Time4tv' not in i[0]] return sort

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param2]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]TOKYO OLYMPICS LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (NB)19 ONLY[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re r = re.findall('(?s)<div class="col-md-12 col-sm-12">\s*<a href="([^"]*).*?name">([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests e = re.findall('var streamsMatchId\s*=\s*([^;]*)',page_data)[0] r = re.findall('var streamsSport\s*=\s*"([^;"]*)',page_data)[0] t = requests.get('https://sportscentral.io/streams-table/' + e + '/' + r + '?new-ui=1&origin=olympicstreams.net', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://olympicstreams.net/'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyu(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'natharaky' not in i[1]] sort1 = [(client.tinyu(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Gold Standard' in i[2] if 'KobeStreams' not in i[1]] return sort + sort1

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,control import re,requests if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return page_data = requests.get('https://daddylive.futbol/').text page_data = page_data.split('>Darts<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>Ice Hockey<',1)[0] e = re.findall('<hr>([^<]*)|href="([^"]*)(?s).*?ner">([^<]*)', page_data) return e

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client url = client.external('[makelist.param2]') return url

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return page_data = site.request('https://daddylive.futbol/') page_data = page_data.split('Rugby Union',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>Horse Racing<',1)[0] e = re.findall('<hr>([^<]*)|href="([^"]*)(?s).*?ner">([^<]*)', page_data) return e
